installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

# Hytale Downloader Installation Script
echo "========================================="
echo "Installing Hytale Downloader"
echo "========================================="

# During installation, we're in /mnt/server, not /home/container yet
cd /mnt/server || exit 1


# Download hytale-downloader
echo "Downloading hytale-downloader..."
wget -q https://downloader.hytale.com/hytale-downloader.zip

if [ ! -f "hytale-downloader.zip" ]; then
    echo "ERROR: Failed to download hytale-downloader.zip"
    exit 1
fi

# Extract the downloader
echo "Extracting downloader..."
mkdir -p temp_extract
unzip -q hytale-downloader.zip -d temp_extract/

# Find and move the binary
if [ -f "temp_extract/hytale-downloader-linux-amd64" ]; then
    mv temp_extract/hytale-downloader-linux-amd64 hytale-downloader
else
    echo "ERROR: Could not find downloader binary in archive"
    echo "Contents of temp_extract/:"
    ls -la temp_extract/
    rm -rf temp_extract
    exit 1
fi

# Clean up temp directory
rm -rf temp_extract

# Set executable permissions
chmod +x bin/hytale-downloader

# Clean up
rm -f hytale-downloader.zip

# Verify installation
if [ -x "hytale-downloader" ]; then
    echo "========================================="
    echo "Hytale Downloader installed successfully!"
    echo "Location: /mnt/server/hytale-downloader"
    echo "(Will be available as /home/container/hytale-downloader after installation)"
    echo "========================================="
    echo ""
    echo ""
    echo "Version info:"
    ./hytale-downloader -version
else
    echo "ERROR: Installation failed"
    exit 1
fi
